text: Ludogorets Arena () is a football stadium in Razgrad, Bulgaria and is the home stadium of Ludogorets Razgrad. It has a capacity of 10,423. The stadium was opened on 25 September 2011. In 2019, the stadium's name was changed to Huvepharma Arena (). == Other websites == * Official website Category:2011 establishments in Europe Category:21st-century establishments in Bulgaria Category:Football stadiums in Europe Category:Buildings and structures in Bulgaria Category:Football in Bulgaria
title: Ludogorets Arena
